hero.name: Raybel Hernández
hero.title: Full Stack Developer with strong frontend mobile and web expertise.
hero.subtitle: Passionate about delivering precise, high-performing digital experiences in every line of code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
about.description1: Software engineer with 4+ years in web and mobile development. Strong command of React and TypeScript on the frontend (component architecture, state management with Redux/Context, and web performance), plus specialization in Flutter/Firebase for cross‑platform products.
about.description2: I have led and contributed to projects like SnapnFund, All in Biking, and TimeForemost, integrating REST APIs, Stripe/QuickBooks, and Google Cloud. Focused on scalable solutions and smooth UX, bringing speed and precision to both code and collaboration.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platform with React, Node.js and MongoDB

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: Task management application with drag & drop and real-time features

snapnfund.description: SnapnFund Development: SnapnFund empowers shoppers to turn everyday purchases into donations by scanning receipts and directing funds to partner nonprofits. I led the full-stack delivery across the Flutter mobile app, the React web experience, and Firebase + ASP.NET services, owning architecture, state management, and release automation. Worked within a SCRUM team to integrate OCR, secure payment workflows, and responsive UI refinements that kept the donor flow fast and reliable.

dealerslash.description: DealerSlash Marketplace: A vehicle buying and selling platform modernized from a legacy Java Spring API into a scalable ASP.NET Core backend. I drove the cloud migration to Google Cloud services and crafted a Flutter mobile experience with bespoke UI components, real-time inventory flows, and polished animations that made browsing and reserving vehicles feel premium.

followApp.description: Follow App: A mobile platform that connects faith communities to share discipleship courses, multimedia resources, and live teachings. I led the Flutter architecture and integrated NestJS + Firebase services for streaming, notifications, and progress tracking. Delivered leader dashboards, multilingual support, and accessible interfaces that reflect each congregation's voice.

timeforemost.description: TimeForemost: Participated in building an enterprise time tracking platform that grew from an internal tool into a full productivity monitoring and analytics service. Contributed to Flutter, NestJS, Google Cloud, and Stripe integrations, highlighting cross-platform delivery, backend orchestration, and payment processing expertise.

automedic.description: AutoMedic Consulting: Served as an external consultant embedded with AutoMedic's development team, a franchise network of mechanic shops. My participation focused on integrating Google Maps for shop discovery and routing and wiring QuickBooks into their invoicing flows to automate billing. Partnered closely with the in-house engineers to land the integrations cleanly within the existing infrastructure.

allInBiking.description: All In Biking: Led the frontend for a cyclist-focused social network on Android and iOS, enabling riders to share moments, enter competitions, and connect with organizations. Directed the Flutter implementation backed by Firebase, Google Cloud, and Neo4J to deliver seamless realtime data and resilient social features.

retarificador.description: Retarificador Alpha Brokers: Contributed to the refactor and optimization of a legacy insurance re-quoting web platform. Applied software best practices and patterns to substantially boost performance and maintainability.

eduq.description: EduQ: Developed a mobile exercise-solving application built with Flutter, focused on preparing students for exams. The app provides an intuitive interface for solving practice exercises, progress tracking, and personalized study tools. Implemented scalable architecture, efficient state management, and a smooth user experience that facilitates continuous learning and practice.

manitas.description: Manitas App: Currently developing a cross-platform application (web and mobile) to connect users with repair and handyman professionals in their local area. The platform enables searching, filtering, and contacting specialized technicians across various fields such as plumbing, electrical work, carpentry, and more. Implementing geolocation features to find nearby professionals, rating and review system, real-time chat, and appointment management. The mobile app is built with Flutter, while the web version will be developed with Next.js to deliver a smooth, scalable cross-platform experience.

chrona.description: Chrona: Currently developing a comprehensive appointment management system for a wide diversity of businesses, with future features on the way. The system enables different types of businesses to efficiently manage their appointments, clients, and schedules. Implementing the web platform with Next.js for the frontend and NestJS for the backend, providing a robust and scalable architecture. The Flutter mobile app is in development to complement the cross-platform experience and offer users complete appointment management from any device.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's Talk!
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting collaborations.
